headline: REGENERON EXPANDS PRESENCE IN CANADA BY OPENING ITS FIRST HEADQUARTERS TO BETTER SERVE NEEDS OF CANADIANS WITH SERIOUS DISEASES
summary: Regeneron Canada Company today officially opened its first headquarters that will allow it to better serve the needs of Canadian patients who may benefit from its life-transforming, innovative medicines for serious diseases.
